page.title: 19LOCAL INDUSTRIES
page.content: There are many small industries related to farming and the sea.Most of these are found in Kirkwall. One of the most important is{whisky {making.}There are two{distilleries}in Orkney.The best whisky is{Highland {Park,}made inside the 12km. survey block. { Tourism}makes a useful contribution to the economy.About 70,000 come each year. Many come to see the{birds}or {ancient monuments,}or to{fish}or {paint,}or just to get away from it all. { Pottery,woodcraft and knitting}all flourish.There is a local tradition of making{chairs}with plaited straw backs and another speciality is making {'cogs'.}These are wooden drinking vessels which are filled with hot fortified home-brew and passed from mouth to mouth at a wedding.
